trans-unit.source: The exception that is thrown when the satellite assembly for the resources of the default culture is missing.
trans-unit.target: 默认区域性资源的附属程序集丢失时引发的异常。

trans-unit.source: The default culture is the culture whose resources are loaded if the appropriate culture-specific resources cannot be found.
trans-unit.target: 默认区域性为如果找不到相应的区域性特定资源加载其资源的区域性。

trans-unit.source: By default, resources for the default culture are located in the main assembly, and a <xref:System.Resources.MissingManifestResourceException> is thrown if the resource manager tries to retrieve but cannot find a resource for the default culture.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，默认区域性的资源位于在主要的程序集中，和一个<xref:System.Resources.MissingManifestResourceException>如果资源管理器尝试检索，但找不到默认区域性的资源，将引发。

trans-unit.source: However, the .NET Framework will load the resources for an app's default culture from a satellite assembly if the <xref:System.Resources.NeutralResourcesLanguageAttribute> attribute specifies a value of <xref:System.Resources.UltimateResourceFallbackLocation.Satellite?displayProperty=nameWithType> for the location parameter.
trans-unit.target: 但是，.NET Framework 将加载应用程序的默认区域性的资源的附属程序集从如果<xref:System.Resources.NeutralResourcesLanguageAttribute>属性指定的值<xref:System.Resources.UltimateResourceFallbackLocation.Satellite?displayProperty=nameWithType>位置参数。

trans-unit.source: When this is the case, the <xref:System.Resources.MissingSatelliteAssemblyException> exception is thrown when the resource manager tries to retrieve a resource of the default culture and the satellite assembly for the culture specified in the <xref:System.Resources.NeutralResourcesLanguageAttribute> attribute is missing.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下，<xref:System.Resources.MissingSatelliteAssemblyException>资源管理器尝试检索默认区域性和中指定的区域性的附属程序集的资源时将引发异常<xref:System.Resources.NeutralResourcesLanguageAttribute>缺少。

trans-unit.source: Note that the exception is thrown by a resource retrieval method such as <xref:System.Resources.ResourceManager.GetString%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or <xref:System.Resources.ResourceManager.GetObject%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, and not when the <xref:System.Resources.ResourceManager> object is instantiated.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，如由资源检索方法引发异常<xref:System.Resources.ResourceManager.GetString%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或<xref:System.Resources.ResourceManager.GetObject%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>，而不<xref:System.Resources.ResourceManager>实例化对象。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Resources.MissingSatelliteAssemblyException> uses the HRESULT COR_E_MISSINGSATELLITEASSEMBLY, which has the value 0x80131536.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Resources.MissingSatelliteAssemblyException> 使用 HRESULT COR_E_MISSINGSATELLITEASSEMBLY，其值 0x80131536。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Resources.MissingSatelliteAssemblyException> uses the default <xref:System.Object.Equals%2A> implementation, which supports reference equality.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Resources.MissingSatelliteAssemblyException> 使用默认<xref:System.Object.Equals%2A>支持引用相等性的实现。

trans-unit.source: For a list of initial property values for an instance of the <xref:System.Resources.MissingSatelliteAssemblyException> class, see the <xref:System.Resources.MissingSatelliteAssemblyException.%23ctor%2A> constructors.
trans-unit.target: 有关的实例的初始属性值的列表<xref:System.Resources.MissingSatelliteAssemblyException>类，请参阅<xref:System.Resources.MissingSatelliteAssemblyException.%23ctor%2A>构造函数。

trans-unit.source: You should always use the <xref:System.Resources.NeutralResourcesLanguageAttribute> attribute to define your app's default culture so that if a resource for a specific culture is unavailable, your application will display acceptable behavior.
trans-unit.target: 应始终使用<xref:System.Resources.NeutralResourcesLanguageAttribute>特性定义应用程序的默认区域性，以便用于特定区域性的资源不可用，如果你的应用程序将显示可接受的行为。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the <xref:System.Resources.NeutralResourcesLanguageAttribute> attribute to indicate that English is the app's default culture and that its resources are stored in a satellite assembly.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例使用<xref:System.Resources.NeutralResourcesLanguageAttribute>特性以指示英语是应用程序的默认区域性，及其资源将存储在附属程序集。

trans-unit.source: The example itself includes resources in .txt files for the English and French cultures, as described in the following table:
trans-unit.target: 本身的示例包括针对英语和法语区域性的.txt 文件中资源下, 表中所述：

trans-unit.source: Culture
trans-unit.target: 区域性

trans-unit.source: Resource name/value
trans-unit.target: 资源名称/值

trans-unit.source: File name
trans-unit.target: 文件名

trans-unit.source: English
trans-unit.target: 英语

trans-unit.source: Greet=Hello
trans-unit.target: Greet=Hello

trans-unit.source: Greet.en.txt
trans-unit.target: Greet.en.txt

trans-unit.source: French
trans-unit.target: 法语

trans-unit.source: Greet=Bonjour
trans-unit.target: Greet=Bonjour

trans-unit.source: Greet.fr.txt
trans-unit.target: Greet.fr.txt

trans-unit.source: The following source code builds an app that changes the current UI culture first to French (France) and then to Russian (Russia) and displays an appropriate culture-specific resource in both cases.
trans-unit.target: 下面的源代码生成的应用程序为法语 （法国），然后执行到俄语 （俄罗斯） 首先更改当前 UI 区域性，并在这两种情况下显示相应的区域性特定资源。

trans-unit.source: You can use the following batch file to build and execute the C# version of the example.
trans-unit.target: 下面的批处理文件可用于构建和执行该示例的 C# 版本。

trans-unit.source: If you're using Visual Basic, replace `csc` with `vbc`, and replace the `.cs` extension with `.vb`.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用 Visual Basic，请将 `csc` 替换为 `vbc`，并将 `.cs` 扩展名替换为 `.vb`。

trans-unit.source: When the example is executed, it displays a French language string but throws a <xref:System.Resources.MissingSatelliteAssemblyException> exception when the current culture is Russian (Russia).
trans-unit.target: 当执行该示例时，它显示的法语语言字符串，但会引发<xref:System.Resources.MissingSatelliteAssemblyException>当前区域性是俄语 （俄罗斯） 时出现异常。

trans-unit.source: This is because the satellite assembly en\HelloWorld.dll that contains the resources of the default culture does not exist.
trans-unit.target: 这是因为附属程序集 en\HelloWorld.dll 包含默认区域性的资源不存在。

trans-unit.source: You can use the following batch file to build and execute the Visual Basic version of the example.
trans-unit.target: 下面的批处理文件可用于构建和执行该示例的 Visual Basic 版本。

trans-unit.source: If you're using C#, replace `vbc` with `csc`, and replace the `.vb` extension with `.cs`.
trans-unit.target: 如果你正在使用 C#，替换`vbc`与`csc`，并将`.vb`扩展名`.cs`。

trans-unit.source: When the example is executed, it displays a French language string when the current UI culture is French (France).
trans-unit.target: 执行该示例，它会显示法语语言字符串时的当前 UI 区域性是法语 （法国）。

trans-unit.source: When the current UI culture is Russia (Russian), it displays an English language string because Russian language resources do not exist, but the resource manager is able to load the resources of the default culture from the satellite assembly en\HelloWorld2.dll.
trans-unit.target: 当当前 UI 区域性俄罗斯 （俄语），它显示英语语言字符串，因为俄语语言资源不存在，但资源管理器是可以从附属程序集 en\HelloWorld2.dll 加载的默认区域性的资源。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Resources.MissingSatelliteAssemblyException" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Resources.MissingSatelliteAssemblyException" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Resources.MissingSatelliteAssemblyException" /> class with default properties.
trans-unit.target: 使用默认属性初始化 <see cref="T:System.Resources.MissingSatelliteAssemblyException" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of the <xref:System.Resources.MissingSatelliteAssemblyException> class.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示 <xref:System.Resources.MissingSatelliteAssemblyException> 类的实例的初始属性值。

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: Property

trans-unit.source: Value
`null`.
trans-unit.target: `null`。

trans-unit.source: The localized error message for <xref:System.Resources.MissingSatelliteAssemblyException>.
trans-unit.target: 本地化的错误消息以<xref:System.Resources.MissingSatelliteAssemblyException>。

trans-unit.source: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
trans-unit.target: 解释异常原因的错误消息。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Resources.MissingSatelliteAssemblyException" /> class with the specified error message.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的错误消息初始化 <see cref="T:System.Resources.MissingSatelliteAssemblyException" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of the <xref:System.Resources.MissingSatelliteAssemblyException> class.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示 <xref:System.Resources.MissingSatelliteAssemblyException> 类的实例的初始属性值。

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: Property

trans-unit.source: Value
`null`.
trans-unit.target: `null`。

trans-unit.source: The `message` string.
trans-unit.target: `message`字符串。

trans-unit.source: The object that holds the serialized object data.
trans-unit.target: 承载序列化对象数据的对象。

trans-unit.source: The contextual information about the source or destination of the exception.
trans-unit.target: 有关异常的源或目标的上下文信息。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Resources.MissingSatelliteAssemblyException" /> class from serialized data.
trans-unit.target: 用序列化数据初始化 <see cref="T:System.Resources.MissingSatelliteAssemblyException" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is called during deserialization to reconstitute the exception object transmitted over a stream.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数在反序列化过程中调用，以便重建通过流传输的异常对象。

trans-unit.source: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
trans-unit.target: 解释异常原因的错误消息。

trans-unit.source: The exception that is the cause of the current exception.
trans-unit.target: 导致当前异常的异常。

trans-unit.source: If the <c>inner</c> parameter is not <see langword="null" />, the current exception is raised in a <see langword="catch" /> block that handles the inner exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <c>inner</c> 参数不为 <see langword="null" />，则当前异常会在处理内部异常的 <see langword="catch" /> 块中引发。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Resources.MissingSatelliteAssemblyException" /> class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的错误消息和对作为此异常原因的内部异常的引用来初始化 <see cref="T:System.Resources.MissingSatelliteAssemblyException" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: An exception that is thrown as a direct result of a previous exception should include a reference to the previous exception in the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 因前一个异常而直接引发的异常应在 <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> 属性中包含对前一个异常的引用。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property returns the same value that is passed into the constructor, or `null` if the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property does not supply the inner exception value to the constructor.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> 属性返回的值与传递到构造函数中的值相同；或者，如果 `null` 属性没有向构造函数提供内部异常值，则为 <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of the <xref:System.Resources.MissingSatelliteAssemblyException> class.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示 <xref:System.Resources.MissingSatelliteAssemblyException> 类的实例的初始属性值。

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: Property

trans-unit.source: Value
The inner exception reference.
trans-unit.target: 内部异常引用。

trans-unit.source: The error message string.
trans-unit.target: 错误消息字符串。

trans-unit.source: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
trans-unit.target: 解释异常原因的错误消息。

trans-unit.source: The name of the neutral culture.
trans-unit.target: 非特定区域性的名称。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Resources.MissingSatelliteAssemblyException" /> class with a specified error message and the name of a neutral culture.
trans-unit.target: 用指定的错误信息和非特定区域性的名称初始化 <see cref="T:System.Resources.MissingSatelliteAssemblyException" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of the <xref:System.Resources.MissingSatelliteAssemblyException> class.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示 <xref:System.Resources.MissingSatelliteAssemblyException> 类的实例的初始属性值。

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: Property

trans-unit.source: Value
The inner exception reference.
trans-unit.target: 内部异常引用。

trans-unit.source: The error message string.
trans-unit.target: 错误消息字符串。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the default culture.
trans-unit.target: 获取默认区域性的名称。

trans-unit.source: The name of the default culture.
trans-unit.target: 默认区域性的名称。

trans-unit.source: The app's default culture is defined by the <xref:System.Resources.NeutralResourcesLanguageAttribute> attribute.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序的默认区域性定义的<xref:System.Resources.NeutralResourcesLanguageAttribute>属性。

trans-unit.source: For a list of culture names, see the [National Language Support (NLS) API Reference](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=200048) at the Go Global Developer Center.
trans-unit.target: 区域性名称的列表，请参阅[区域语言支持 (NLS) API 参考](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=200048)转全局开发人员中心。
